title: Font ID
content:
I’m looking for a font identification please. It looks very familiar, and I just can’t remember what it is.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709010130/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-1_2.jpg) | 21.65 KB |

 [‹ anyone know this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709010130/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37948 "Go to previous forum topic") [Rio 65 Trio album cover ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709010130/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37734 "Go to next forum topic")
author: beats

comments.content: Please show us a sample. We can’t read your mind. And it would help to have a more descriptive title for your thread.
Hmm... you can’t view the attached image? It’s showing up on my end.
